sentence: I look forward to seeing the progress on my next trips
Even though the hotel was under some renovations it still had everything I needed for an enjoyable business trip
It was for a short business trip and hence the renovations did not bother me as much but I can imagine casual holidayers being disturbed by the noise
On this trip we saw the GM around the lounge talking with some of the employees but she seemed busy so we did not want to interrupt them

Now is a normal swimming pool plain fake grass the fountain has disappeared not nice and very noisy coz the same group built a office building behind and they put all the air conditioning machines just near the swimming pool
Stayed at the Plaza Athene for two nights during a trip through SE Asia
See my review on trip advisor
I have been to 3 other 5 stars hotel in this trip the only bell service comparable is St Regis but I still think that Plaza Athene is even better
I can not believe something like this could happened in a 5 star hotel and it is such a shame for SPG group member hotel to have stolen cases inside a guest room and untrustworthy hotel employee
I am very disappointed with this 5 star SPG group member hotel
I stayed here for 5 nights as part of a work leisure trip in my first trip to Thailand and this place was amazing from A to Z Check in was easy and the lobby was beautiful
5 star hotels should have all staff like this with what we experienced in The Athene Hotel Overall I must stay on me of the best holiday staycation ever in Bangkok
My family and I have travelled all over the world during the last 50 yrs and have stayed at many famous hotel from 3 stars to 7 stars
I was here for a conference and my family joined me
Our family got the impression that it is clean and clean hotel
I stayed in the hotel for 2 days wuth business trip and enjoyed breakfast at the Rain Tree
Thank you all the services to our group next time we will come back next month
This time staffs surprised us with special room arangment in celebrating my wife pre Birthday vacation
Overall great trip from start to finish
The Concierge was able to help me enjoy a local holiday celebration and get to all of the Bangkok sites although I only had one weekend free
